title: The Best Piece Of Trivia You Learned This Week, Betty White Edition
teaser: We know you've been pondering this for a while, fair listener. Who is older: Betty White or sliced bread? Wonder no more, the answer is here!
contentencoded:
What's the best piece of trivia you learned this week? Share it with us on Facebook or Twitter, and we'll figure out whether it's true or false.

We know you've been pondering this for a while, fair listener. Who is older: Betty White or sliced bread? Wonder no more, the answer is here!

Heard in Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
